entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Kentville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 p.m. ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or freezing rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain or ice pellets beginning in the evening then changing to freezing rain overnight. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and after midnight. Rain along parts of the coast. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023
